memberdef.argsstring: (snd_timer_t **timer, const char *name, snd_config_t *timer_root, snd_config_t *timer_conf, int mode)
memberdef.name: snd_timer_open_conf

briefdescription.para: Opens a new connection to the timer interface.

detaileddescription.para:
timer
Returned handle (NULL if not wanted)
name
ASCII identifier of the timer handle
mode
Open mode
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Opens a new connection to the timer interface specified with an ASCII identifier and mode.

briefdescription.para: Opens a new connection to the timer interface using local configuration.

detaileddescription.para:
timer
Returned handle (NULL if not wanted)
name
ASCII identifier of the timer handle
mode
Open mode
lconf
Local configuration
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Opens a new connection to the timer interface specified with an ASCII identifier and mode.

timer
timer handle
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Closes the specified timer handle and frees all associated resources.

timer
a timer handle
ascii identifier of timer handle Returns the ASCII identifier of given timer handle. It's the same identifier specified in snd_timer_open().

timer
a timer handle
type of timer handle Returns the type snd_timer_type_t of given timer handle.

briefdescription.para: Add an async handler for a timer.

detaileddescription.para:
handler
Returned handler handle
timer
timer handle
callback
Callback function
private_data
Callback private data
0 otherwise a negative error code on failure The asynchronous callback is called when new timer event occurs.

briefdescription.para: Return timer handle related to an async handler.

briefdescription.para: get size of the snd_timer_info_t structure in bytes

simplesect.para: size of the snd_timer_info_t structure in bytes

detaileddescription.para:
info
returned pointer
0 on success otherwise a negative error code if fails Allocates a new snd_timer_info_t structure using the standard malloc C library function.

info
pointer to the snd_timer_info_t structure to free
Frees the given snd_timer_info_t structure using the standard free C library function.
